title: Scarf, ca. 1770
medium:
Medium: pina cloth, silk
Technique: embroidered
description: Rectangular scarf with embroidery in a design depicting at each end, a vase with plant. Around the outside are borders of flowers in embroidery and drawnwork. Edges are scalloped. Lined with blue silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scarf, ca. 1770.Medium: pina cloth, silk
Technique: embroidered. 1947-55-1.
